Just don't walk in and making major changes with out regard for earlier discussions and improvement efforts. This is unacceptable. You were already warned before not to do that!

The controversies need to bementioned in lead. You can shorten it if you want - no blanking things out. The consular sheet with the warning is still there on wikipedia.
